attributes.background: 5G cell towers are more dangerous than other cell towers because of the shorter length of millimeter waves (MMV). The microwaves (radiation) can cause memory loss, headaches, cancer, birth defects and heart disease. We don't know how humans will react to exposure to such a powerful waves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government or Parliament to commission and fund an independent inquiry into the safety of mobile internet signals.

You will need to give your full name in order to start a new petition.
